rules_text:
When Transit Portal enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on an artifact or creature you control.
Grand evolution 1–{1} [i]({1}: If this isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature, then put a +1/+1 counter on it. Activate as a sorcery.)[/i]
